comment: She is hard to understand but is very nice and teaches an easy class. As long as you do the work you will get an A. But if you are looking for a wellness class to actually get fit, this is not the class for you.

Professor Mao is a wonderful educator. Plenty of people will say that her accent makes her difficult to understand, but I believe it is a matter of wanting to understand her. She is a very sweet woman and wants all her students to succeed. She will do everything in her power to help you pass the class. I'd absolutely take her again!

She's good for an easy A. Even if you don't do your work, she will open up the modules (even the midterm) for you to take them. If you don't like students who try less than you and get the same grade, her class is not for you.
She's nice but hard to understand sometimes. It doesn't really hinder the class too much though cause every test/quiz is open note and book. Couldn't ask for an easier class, easy A.
Nice professor but is a bit difficult to understand her accent at times. To be honest her lectures are pretty boring but the material is easy to understand.

Yes she is VERY hard to understand, but the good thing is that she knows it and she makes sure you understand everything. She is understanding and very kind. Lectures were hard to sit through sometimes, but overall the class wasn't bad. But I totally recommend this class for the Summer. I could not imagine sitting through it for 4 months

I'll agree she means well. But she really really speaks English as a second language. Lecture is very difficult to understand. The good news is the class is easy and so is she. A minimum amount of reading the course material and doing the labs has gotten me an A. I gave up after a month on understanding her and slept the rest of the time...

She is so difficult to understand! It is so hard to sit through a class and actually pay attention. She goes off on tangents and makes jokes, but I'm never really sure what she is talking about... On the other hand, if you read the book and participate in the labs it is very easy to get a good grade. Only 3 exams worth 75 points.

She's sweet and helpful, but difficult to understand. She wants everyone to succeed, even if they're really really out of shape. Not a lot of physical activity required, and most questions on the tests comes from the text book.

I took Dr.  Mao for HPS 1000 during the summer on Saturdays.  Yes, she is extremely hard to understand because of her accent.  But she will do anything and everything to help you get a great grade in this class.  She wants you to learn.  Her tests were easy and came straight from the book.  Take the summer class, it is only 8 weeks long!

Let's get this out of the way: Yes, Prof. Mao has a pretty thick accent. However, she tries to make sure everyone understands what's going on. She sets you up to succeed at every turn -- the only way not to make an A is if you don't try at all.
She is hard to understand but very helpful.If you make any attempt at all in her class,she will make sure you get an A.

Prof. Mao is a great professor! She's extremely helpful & very relaxed. Her accent is heavy, but you can always e-mail her during the week if you have any questions. Attendance isn't mandatory, but is highly recommended if you want a good grade in the class. She assigns many labs from the textbook, & structures her tests straight from the book.

Very approachable and kind professor! You can tell she genuinely wants her students to do well. Her accent is heavy, but she compensates by using a projector and going through everything so that if you dont understand her you can see/read what she is referencing. She comes early & always stays after class to help & answer addt'l questions.

I really enjoyed Prof. Mao. Yeah, she has an accent but you can still understand her. Her test were easy if you read the chapters. Unknowingly, I took the first 3 tests without taking the pre-test from the book on-line and didnt do to well, but after suggested that I take the pre-tests first, I began to pass the test with A's. She's great..easy A.

Mao is a great professor. She does not have the best english, but she is very understandable if you actually try to understand. She tests from the book and notes. Labs are very easy because if you did it you get full credit. She tries to give partial credit when labs are late. If you take her on Sat 8am you will  have some days off.
Professor was extremely difficult to understand, but you start getting used to it after the first few classes (and find that she is funny!)If you read the book, the tests should be a breeze.

I could not understand her at all. It never gets better and sometimes it is even worst. I felt lost at times in her class because of not being able to understand her. It is very possible to get an A in the class though. If you just read the textbook u will be ok .the test are easy.  study two days in advance before the test and you will get an A

She is very hard to understand, it does not mater where you sit in her class. The class is very easy and her test are not hard. We got a new book this year so she might have change her test. Do not take it on Saturday only if you have to take it but if you do, you will be in good hands. If you do not understand ask. Easy A if you read the textbook.
Very nice lady, she is good teaching this class despite any inconveniences with her accent. Definitely Recommended!!!

Dr. Mao is an excellent teacher.  VERY HARD TO UNDERSTAND REGARDLESS of where you sit in her class.  Her tests were hard but straight from the book.  She allows you to make up your grade by giving plenty of extra credit assignments. She is an EASY class to pass...Really.  I wish I had her for all my class. Enjoy!

Great teacher...Very Helpful...very nice...but CAN'T UNDERSTAND A WORD SHE IS SAYING. Must read book for yourself to understand the material. Mrs. Mao is a very easy class to pass if you read the book.  she also makes it easy for you by giving lots of extra credit assignments.  Be prepared for her first test...whew!!!

Some students complained about not being able to understand her, however; those students usually sat in the back or sides of the class.  Excellent professor, very compassionate, wish more instructors at KSU were like her!  Highly recommend Mao but be sure to sit in front due to her heavy accent.

More a "health" class, than PE class, Dr. Mao follows the textbook giving lessons on health and fitness using labs on nutrition, body mass etc. Pedometer lab is the main physical aspect, introduction to nautilus machines another. Read suggested pages before tests and you'll do OK. grades are scaled. I enjoy her class.
Dr.Mao is hard to understand due to her accent, but is knowledgeable on the material. class is boring, 8am on Saturday is not the best time to take a class where the instructor cannot be understood

Dr. Mao is a great teacher.  She has a heavy accent so it can be hard to understand her in the beginning.  All you have to do it read the chapters, attend class, listen to lectures, take notes, study for tests and you should have an A.  She is flexible with which section of class you can attend, missed or late assignments and extra credit.

Prof. Mao is a really nice person - she wants you to do well and is very flexible.  However, the tests are rather difficult and if you don't study you will not pass.  Textbook is a must, tests come straight from there, plus she is a little tricky with the questions (multiple and T/F) Three easy projects. take Prof. Mao!

Dr. Mao's accent is very thick and at times very hard to understand. I took her class on a saturday and it really wasn't bad at all! She offers extra credit, allows you to fix things you've done for a better grade, but definitely beware of the first test...it WILL shock you.
great teacher. i had her on a saturday and didnt even mind. study though, that first test will shock you!
Exellent professor- diffucult to understand sometimes b/c of her accent but she knows her stuff and she made class fun. An very easy A.

Dr Mao was a WONDERFUL professor!  I wish more professors were like her!  She is easy going, sometimes a little hard to understand.  I would recommend sitting in the front of the class so you may hear her better.  If you don't understand something just ask her and she will help you.  Finally a professor that cares about their students! A+++++

I really liked this prof. She is really nice and very flexible. All labs are out of the book, no extra papers to write. She makes the activity days fun. I enjoyed the class alot more than I thought I would. She is a little difficult to understand but is always willing to repeat things if needed. I recommend her class.

Really need to go to class, but not necessarily to pay attention to the lecture but to the activities coming up. All activites were done in class. Nothing posted online. Easy activities based off book. Used book for everything. Tests were hard but straight from book, yet there is a lot of activities to make you an A.
She was really hard to understand, and the tests were ridiculously hard for a fitness class.
I recommend professor Mao's class, she has a good sense of humor and is very patient.
Easy A! All u have to do is to study the chapters from text book and she also review what is on the test.  She gives 6 points extra credit to your final grade i f u do bonus
